item.title: Comment on BUNQ by Mathew Porters

item.description: Really cool and colourful brand, responsive layout is nice, simple and clean, great job guys.
item.content:encoded: Really cool and colourful brand, responsive layout is nice, simple and clean, great job guys.

item.title: Comment on Updatey by Benjamin Dell
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dell
item.description:
Hey, thanks for featuring us. Happy to answer any questions, if there are any.
Most importantly, we'd love to know what the wider design community thinks of Updatey (both from a design standpoint, as well as a tool to use with your clients to help increase transparency and engagement once a project has kicked off :)
Thanks again,
Ben Founder & CEO, Updatey
item.content:encoded:
Hey, thanks for featuring us. Happy to answer any questions, if there are any.

Most importantly, we’d love to know what the wider design community thinks of Updatey (both from a design standpoint, as well as a tool to use with your clients to help increase transparency and engagement once a project has kicked off

Thanks again,

Ben
Founder & CEO, Updatey

item.title: Comment on Why is it so quiet here? by Inguna Trepsa
item.dc:creator: Inguna Trepsa
item.description:
I am one of this crowd of fans hoping, yearning for a post or other sign of life. I let out a small sigh every time I am denied this small pleasure, which, sadly, reveals the troubled state of my internet habits.
P.S. I'm with Robert I love your taste.
item.content:encoded:
I am one of this crowd of fans hoping, yearning for a post or other sign of life. I let out a small sigh every time I am denied this small pleasure, which, sadly, reveals the troubled state of my internet habits.

P.S. I’m with Robert I love your taste.

item.title: Comment on Why is it so quiet here? by Ajesh K S
item.dc:creator: Ajesh K S
item.description: This is a good gallery especially for The UK webdesign style also i can see some new websites links that haven't listed in any of other web design galleries. I am used to check with this website when i start new projects designs.
item.content:encoded: This is a good gallery especially for The UK webdesign style also i can see some new websites links that haven’t listed in any of other web design galleries. I am used to check with this website when i start new projects designs.

item.title: Comment on Why is it so quiet here? by Robert O'Shaughnessy
item.dc:creator: Robert O'Shaughnessy
item.description:
I was starting to get worried. I checked your twitter feed to make sure you were not dead or injured or stuck in crevasse somewhere.
I still kept faithfully checking the site every few days to for my design hit.
Soooo glad you are back don't ever leave me again.
There are lots of design aggregators out there but I love your taste. The next time you decide to take a break remember somewhere there will be a sad Irish man constantly hitting refresh on his browser waiting for your return.
Keep up the awesome work and congrats on the baby!
item.content:encoded:
I was starting to get worried. I checked your twitter feed to make sure you were not dead or injured or stuck in crevasse somewhere.

I still kept faithfully checking the site every few days to for my design hit.

Soooo glad you are back don’t ever leave me again.

There are lots of design aggregators out there but I love your taste. The next time you decide to take a break remember somewhere there will be a sad Irish man constantly hitting refresh on his browser waiting for your return.

Keep up the awesome work and congrats on the baby!

item.title: Comment on Foursum by Coherent Solutions

item.description: As for me, the scale of this site must be worked on. The print is too large. But in general the design is very nice!

item.title: Comment on Shaken.cc by Coherent Solutions

item.description: The site looks quite good, but it needs lots of attention. there are lots of things to be done!
item.content:encoded: The site looks quite good, but it needs lots of attention. there are lots of things to be done!
